title: Madou King Granzort (Mado King Granzort)
synopsis: In the future, the moon is a habitable place with atmosphere and gravity and also a famous tourist attraction. There are also stories about a "long ears" creature like rabbits on the moon who can use magic. Haruka Daichi heads off to the moon during a summer holiday alone because he likes to see the long ears creature by himself.
related_anime: ['Madou King Granzort: Saigo no Magical Taisen', 'Madou King Granzort: Nonstop Rabi']
voices: ['Hayashibara, Megumi', 'Adachi, Shinobu', 'Matsuoka, Youko', 'Ootaki, Shinya', 'Suzuki, Reiko', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Matsuda, Tatsuya', 'Hayashibara, Megumi']
